```{python, results='asis'}

import sympy

x = sympy.Symbol('x')
polynomial = (2 * x + 3)**4
output = polynomial.expand()
xx = '$' + sympy.printing.latex(output) + '$'

print(xx)
```



-------------------------


```{python, results='asis'}
from sympy import *
from latex2sympy2 import latex2sympy

p = latex2sympy(r'x^4-6x+1')
q = latex2sympy(r'3x^3-5x')
r = latex2sympy(r'x^4-x^2+2')

print('$' + printing.latex(simplify(p + 3 * q + r)) + '$')
```
